snippet: New York’s Citi Bike program has been delayed, but two Web-based start-ups are working on alternatives to Citi Bike.
abstract: App City column on start-ups Spinlister and Social Bicycles, which are positioning themselves as alternatives to Citi Bike, New York City's bike-sharing program that has now been pushed back to the spring of 2013.
lead_paragraph: New York’s Citi Bike program has been delayed, but two Web-based start-ups are working on alternatives to Citi Bike.

headline.seo: Spinlister and Social Bicycles Develop Bike-Sharing Alternatives
headline.main: There’s More Than One Way to Share a Bike
